autoContrast.description: Determines whether text color should depend on background-color. If luminosity of the color prop is less than theme.luminosityThreshold, then theme.white will be used for text color, otherwise theme.black. Overrides theme.autoContrast.
autoContrast.description_zh: 确定文本颜色是否应取决于 background-color。如果 color 属性的亮度小于 theme.luminosityThreshold，则 theme.white 将用于文本颜色，否则使用 theme.black。覆盖 theme.autoContrast。

color.description: Key of theme.colors or any valid CSS color value, theme.primaryColor by default
color.description_zh: theme.colors 的键或任何有效的 CSS 颜色值，默认为 theme.primaryColor

disabled.description: When Indicator is disabled it renders children only
disabled.description_zh: 当 Indicator 被禁用时，它只渲染子项

inline.description: Determines whether the indicator container should be an inline element, false by default
inline.description_zh: 确定指示器容器是否应为内联元素，默认为 false

label.description: Label rendered inside the indicator, for example, notification count
label.description_zh: 在指示器内呈现的标签，例如通知计数

offset.description: Indicator offset relative to the target element, usually used for elements with border-radius, equals to size by default
offset.description_zh: 指示符相对于目标元素的偏移量，通常用于具有 border-radius 的元素，默认情况下等于 size

position.description: Indicator position relative to the target element, 'top-end' by default
position.description_zh: 指示器相对于目标元素的位置，默认为 'top-end'

processing.description: Determines whether the indicator should have processing animation, false by default
processing.description_zh: 确定指示器是否应具有 processing animation，默认情况下为 false

radius.description: Key of theme.radius or any valid CSS value to set border-radius, 100 by default
radius.description_zh: theme.radius 的 Key 或任何用于设置 border-radius 的有效 CSS 值，默认为 100

size.description: Indicator width and height, 10 by default
size.description_zh: 指示器宽度和高度，默认为 10

withBorder.description: Determines whether the indicator should have a border (color of the border is the same as the body element), false by default
withBorder.description_zh: 确定指示器是否应具有边框（边框的颜色与 body 元素相同），默认情况下为 false
